items.short_desc: The Indian football team will return to action against Oman in an international friendly on Thursday. Sunil Chhetri will not play. Watch live telecast in India.
items.asset_title: Watch India vs Oman international friendly live in India: Get match times and full Indian football team squad

items.short_desc: The I-League 2021 could be decided in the TRAU FC vs Churchill Brothers match on Sunday. Get live streaming, telecast details and know the I-League champions list.
items.asset_title: TRAU FC vs Churchill Brothers: Who will be crowned I-League 2021 champions? - watch live

items.short_desc: Premier League giants Arsenal and Manchester United learn their opponents for the UEFA Europa League quarterfinal stage in the draw.
items.asset_title: UEFA Europa League Draw: Arsenal face Slavia Praha as Man United take on Granada

items.short_desc: Defending champions Bayern Munich will face last year’s runners-up PSG while Liverpool will meet Real Madrid in the quarter-finals of the UEFA Champions League.
items.asset_title: UEFA Champions League quarter-final draw: Bayern lock horns with PSG, Liverpool to face Madrid

items.short_desc: The title challenge intensifies between Al Jazira and Baniyas in UAE Arabian Gulf League. Get schedule, fixtures and match times for India.
items.asset_title: Al Jazira, Baniyas head table in UAE Arabian Gulf League: Get full schedule, fixtures and India match times

items.short_desc: Can anyone stop the Central Coast Mariners? Get the full schedule for the A-League, fixtures and India match times and everything else you need to know.
items.asset_title: A-League 2020-21: Get full schedule, fixtures and India match times

items.short_desc: Ajax lead over PSV in Eredivisie 2020-21. Get the full schedule, fixtures, match times for the Dutch league and know where to watch live telecast in India.
items.asset_title: Eredivisie 2020-21: Ajax, PSV in title race, get schedule, fixtures and know where to watch live in India

items.short_desc: Table-toppers Besiktas take on Fenerbahce in matchday 31 of Super Lig 2020-21. Mesut Ozil will miss the game. Get the schedule, fixtures and India match times.
items.asset_title: Super Lig 2020-21 matchday 31: Mesut Ozil to miss Besiktas tie, get schedule, fixtures and India match times

items.asset_title: Liga MX title-race heats up with Cruz Azul, Club América: Get full schedule, fixtures and India match times

items.short_desc: The Premier League 2021-22 season will revert to its usual start in the second week of August, following delays in 2019-20 and 2020-21 due to the pandemic.
items.asset_title: Premier League 2021-22 season start and end date revealed

items.short_desc: From Liverpool's come-from-behind win over Newcastle to Steven Gerrard's iconic slip against Chelsea, we revisit three Premier League ties that played a significant role in title races.
items.asset_title: Three title-defining matches in the Premier League era

items.short_desc: From a mouth-watering North London derby to a scintillating top-four clash at Old Trafford,  we bring you insights on the top games in the Premier League's GW 28.
items.asset_title: EPL Adda Notes: Numbers to help you win Matchweek 28

items.short_desc: Manchester United’s 2-0 win in the Manchester Derby saw them move third with 22 games unbeaten on the road.
items.asset_title: Longest unbeaten away runs in English football

items.short_desc: Alex Ferguson needed immediate surgery after suffering a brain haemorrhage in 2018 and admits that he feared he would never speak again.
items.asset_title: Alex Ferguson admits risk of losing memory after brain surgery

items.short_desc: Ahead of the 185th Manchester Derby, we look at who makes the cut in a Man City-Man Utd combined XI.
items.asset_title: City players dominate the combined XI for 185th Manchester Derby

items.short_desc: From Liverpool hosting Chelsea to Manchester City facing Wolves, some of the most exciting EPL fixtures await you this matchweek.
items.asset_title: EPL Adda Notes: Numbers that will help you this matchweek

items.short_desc: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp has made peace with the fact that finishing within the Champions League spot would be a big achievement for the Reds.
items.asset_title: Finishing in top 4 would be a big achievement, admits Jurgen Klopp

items.short_desc: West Ham sits comfortably 7️⃣ points and 5️⃣ places above Arsenal, but who are you backing based on their recent form? 🤔 Here's everything you need to know ahead of West Ham vs Arsenal. 📋
items.asset_title: Numbers that help you win | West Ham vs Arsenal

items.asset_title: Numbers that help you win | Arsenal vs Tottenham Hotspur

items.short_desc: A Mbappe-led PSG thrashed Barcelona last time out. Will we see a repeat of the same or can Barcelona stand up to the occasion? Here are the numbers that will matter ahead of the blockbuster.

items.short_desc: On the second day of the 47th Junior National Kabaddi Championship, defending champions SAI boys registered another dominant result, beating Rajasthan comprehensively.
items.asset_title: Defending champs SAI boys dominate on second day of junior nationals kabaddi 2021 too

items.short_desc: Defending champions at the 47th Junior National Kabaddi Championship, SAI boys and Haryana girls kickstarted their campaign with dominating performances at Suryapet.
items.asset_title: Defending champs SAI boys, Haryana girls kick off junior nationals kabaddi 2021 with crushing wins

items.short_desc: A temporary stand collapsed during the inaugural ceremony for the start of the 47th National Junior Kabaddi Championship in Suryapet, Telangana injuring scores of fans.
items.asset_title: More than 100 injured, 20 critical after stand collapses at kabaddi junior nationals

items.short_desc: The Junior Nationals Kabaddi Championships 2021 will be held in Suryapet, Telangana. Get full schedule, know teams, groups and times. Ajay Thakur will be watching.
items.asset_title: Junior National Kabaddi 2021: Platform for India hopefuls, Ajay Thakur in selection committee - full schedule

items.short_desc: PKL season 8 likely to be held in the July-October window, but no exact start date yet. Broadcast rights for the league to go on auction, Star Sports expected to bid.
items.asset_title: Pro Kabaddi 2021 starting date likely in July
